text: Mattu navu manavarige avana hettavara kuritu upadesisiruvevu. Avana tayiyu bennu bennige sankastagalannu sahisi avanannu tanna hotteyalli hottiddalu. Avanige edehalu bidisalu eradu varsagalu tagulidavu â€“ addarinda nanagu ninna tayi â€“ tandegu krtajnanagiru. Konege ninu nannedege marali barabekagide
